title: Traits and Features

Wood Elf Lvl 1 Wood Half-Elf Lvl 1 Hellish Resistance Feature Your blood protects you from flame, abyssal or otherwise. You have resistance to Fire and take only half damage from it. Tiefling Superior Darkvision Feature This creature can see in the dark within 24m.
